name: Veloren
description:
Veloren is a multiplayer voxel RPG written in Rust. It is inspired by games such as Cube World, Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Dwarf Fortress, and Minecraft.

Veloren is fully open-source, licensed under GPL 3. It uses original graphics, music, and other assets created by its volunteer community. Being contributor-driven, its development community and user community is one and the same: developers, players, artists, and musicians come together to develop the game.

Veloren is developed by a community of volunteers that have one unifying aim: creating a bright, colourful, fun world that can be explored and interacted with in unique and interesting ways.
